sentences.simplifiedText: 我有一条很重要的消息需要你转告给他。
sentences.traditionalText: 我有一條很重要的消息需要你轉告給他。
sentences.pinyin: Wǒ yǒu yītiáo hěn zhòngyào de xiāoxi xūyào nǐ zhuǎngào gěi tā.
sentences.translation: I have a very important message that you need to pass on to him.

sentences.simplifiedText: 请将这个消息转告给他。
sentences.traditionalText: 請將這個消息轉告給他。
sentences.pinyin: Qǐng jiāng zhège xiāoxī zhuǎngào gěi tā.
sentences.translation: Please pass this message on to him.

sentences.simplifiedText: 如果你看到约翰，可以帮我转告他我明天不会来上班了吗？
sentences.traditionalText: 如果你看到約翰，可以幫我轉告他我明天不會來上班了嗎？
sentences.pinyin: Rúguǒ nǐ kàn dào Yuēhàn, kěyǐ bāng wǒ zhuǎngào tā wǒ míngtiān bú huì lái shàngbān le ma?
sentences.translation: If you see John, can you tell him for me that I won’t be coming to work tomorrow?
